backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, file uploads, and CRUD maps for properties, houses, agents, and other property types with access‑controlled operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in routing, forms, storage, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and global styles including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading fonts, manifest, icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch caching, and cache‑cleaning activation for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with authenticated routes and layout wrapping, handling redirects to login.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: React auth context managing login, logout, stored state, and credential verification.
frontend/src/auth/authStore.ts: LocalStorage‑based storage of auth state and credentials with default username/password and validation functions.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation links, user info, online status, settings, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AttachmentPicker: Component to add, rename, and remove file attachments using a hidden file input.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Shows an online/offline badge based on network status.
frontend/src/features/search/searchIndex: Filters records by checking query matches across multiple fields.
frontend/src/forms/CommercialLandForm.ts: Form for creating commercial land records with attachments and local save operations.
frontend/src/forms/CustomerForm.tsx: Form to create customer records with status toggling and local record saving.
frontend/src/forms/HouseForm.tsx: Form for adding house property details with attachment uploading and local save hooks.
frontend/src/forms/OtherCategoryForm.tsx: Generic form for saving records of arbitrary property categories with attachments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalRepository.ts: Implements React Query hooks for CRUD operations on local records, agents, and attachments stored in localDb.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browser’s online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorageMode.ts: Manages the current storage mode and persists changes via storageMode utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, components, utilities, and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDetailsPage.tsx: Displays details for a single agent with delete and document download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AgentListPage.tsx: Shows all agents and provides a form to create new agents with optional citizenship file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with search, filtering, and quick access to records and agents.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login form page that validates credentials using useAuth and redirects to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/NewEntryPage.tsx: Page for selecting a record category and rendering the appropriate form to create a new entry.
frontend/src/pages/RecordDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a record with options to delete it and navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for updating login credentials, choosing storage mode, and importing or exporting app data.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/storage/localDb.ts: IndexedDB wrapper providing CRUD operations for records, agents, and attachments.
frontend/src/storage/storageMode.ts: Manages storage mode preference in localStorage, supporting 'local' or 'canister' modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theming for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an offline real‑estate web app with local storage, Excel-based import/export, login flow, dashboard, and feature list.
